Description:

AiAsk Summary is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your reading and research experience. This tool skillfully extracts the main outline from any article you're browsing, providing a structured overview of its content.

ChangeLog:

V 0.0.2
- Add youtube video support
- Display outline detail when part is ready

Features:

Automatic Outline Generation: Instantly capture the essence of any online article, breaking it down into an organized, easy-to-understand outline.
User-friendly Interface: Navigate through articles with ease, thanks to our intuitive design.
Enhanced Reading Efficiency: Quickly identify key points and sections, saving time and improving comprehension.

How it Works:

Browse: Open any article on your Chrome browser.
Activate: Click on the icon in your browser toolbar or in the page right side.
Extract: The extension analyzes the article and displays a concise outline.


Ideal for:

Researchers and students compiling information.
Professionals who need to digest a lot of content quickly.
Anyone looking to improve their online reading efficiency.
